Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.serveronly

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.network.serveronly.Server
  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represent the main Server which is the common part shared by both Socket and RMI.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description

      Reference to the WaitingRoom, which gathers user before game starts

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Server​(int socketPort)
      Constructor Initialize the main Server by first creating a WaitingRoom, then getting its local host address and assigning it to the attribute ipAddress and finally starting the two type of Server.
      Server​(int socketPort, int serverPort, int clientPort)
      Constructor w/ rmi ports Initialize the main Server by first creating a WaitingRoom, then getting its local host address and assigning it to the attribute ipAddress and finally starting the two type of Server.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server​(int socketPort)
        Constructor Initialize the main Server by first creating a WaitingRoom, then getting its local host address and assigning it to the attribute ipAddress and finally starting the two type of Server.

      • Server

        public Server​(int socketPort,
              int serverPort,
              int clientPort)
        Constructor w/ rmi ports Initialize the main Server by first creating a WaitingRoom, then getting its local host address and assigning it to the attribute ipAddress and finally starting the two type of Server.
        Parameters:
        clientPort - is the port for the client rmi registry
        serverPort - is the port for the server rmi registry
        socketPort - is the port used for creating the socket server

    • Method Detail

      • startGame

        private static void startGame()

      • addPlayer

        public static int addPlayer​(java.lang.String name,
                            PlayerColor playerColor,
                            ToView toView)
                     throws NameAlreadyTakenException,
                            ColorAlreadyTakenException,
                            OverMaxPlayerException,
                            GameAlreadyStartedException
        this function is used to propagate the login and handle the clients registration in the main server
        Parameters:
        name - is the name chosen by the player
        playerColor - is the color chosen by the player
        toView - is the thread they use to communicate (-1 if rmi)
        Returns:
        the id of the player
        Throws:
        NameAlreadyTakenException
        ColorAlreadyTakenException
        OverMaxPlayerException
        GameAlreadyStartedException

      • reconnect

        public static int reconnect​(java.lang.String name,
                            ToView toView)
                     throws GameNonExistentException
        This function will be used for reconnection
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the player
        toView - is the interface to reach him
        Returns:
        the player id if found or -1
        Throws:
        GameNonExistentException - if no games are running

      • removePlayer

        public static void removePlayer​(int playerId)
        function that have to be called by the pingers if the client disconnects
        Parameters:
        playerId - is the id of the player

      • getController

        public static Controller getController()
        Returns:
        a static reference to the controller, used to call Controller methods inside network methods

      • setController

        public static void setController​(Controller controller)
        Sets the Controller passed as a parameter to the controller attribute inside this class
        Parameters:
        controller - Controller to be passed as a parameter

      • getWaitingRoom

        public static WaitingRoom getWaitingRoom()
        Returns:
        a reference to the WaitingRoom
